World.name: The Great Fishing Frontier
World.description: A sprawling landscape filled with diverse waterways, national parks, and fishing hot spots across the American wilderness. Players embark on a quest to master the art of fishing, facing unique environmental challenges and competing against fellow anglers.
key_challenges: Navigating treacherous waters during seasonal storms.
Identifying and catching elusive fish species with specific bait requirements.
Competing in local and national fishing tournaments with varying rules and conditions.
